name: Sparkhoppning
description:
A short game made during the Arctic Game Jam, spring 2021.

Controls:

W - Push

A, D - Turn left and right

ESC - Exit game

Speed is Glory

Made by:

Marcus Lyth

Patrik Andersson

Johan Rosenberg

Oscar Nyberg
